name: Gajendra Deshpande
bio: I have delivered talks at JuliaCon 2018, 2020 and various Python conferences worldwide. I use Python and Julia extensively for teaching and research. My major work includes using Python and Julia to develop prototypes in the field of Cyber Security and Artificial Intelligence. I lead PyData Belagavi and OWASP Belagavi chapters. I love to mentor students and volunteer at Free and Open Source events.
